title: Data Engineer
description:
DataTrend Solutions is Hiring a Data Engineer (Full-Time)

DataTrend Solutions, a Mexico City-based firm, builds data pipelines for clients in retail and tech. We’re seeking a Data Engineer to enhance our data infrastructure.

About the Role
You’ll design and manage data pipelines to support analytics.

Your Tasks

  • Build pipelines with Python.
    - Integrate data sources.
    - Optimize workflows.
    - Collaborate for reporting.
    - Ensure data quality.
    - Conduct performance testing.
    - Stay updated on data trends.
    - Support client data needs.
    - Perform system audits.
    - Share team best practices.

Qualifications
We need candidates with 2–3 years of experience in data engineering, proficient in Python, Spark, and SQL. Cloud platform experience and data modeling skills are essential. A Bachelor’s degree in computer science or a related field is required.

Why DataTrend?
We’re innovators in data. Our hybrid work model and training support growth in a collaborative environment.

Perks
Health insurance
Pension
20 days of annual leave
Training budget
Data tools access
Team events

Apply Now
Join DataTrend Solutions to build data solutions. Submit your application today!

#DataTrendCareers #DataEngineering #HiringNow
